column5: Well appointed STUDIO for up to 4 people. Has a queen bed and a fold out sofa. Fully equipped kitchen has stove/oven, refrigerator and microwave. Plenty of room with closet/drawers and living space during the day to watch some TV. The complex has a cool pool and BBQ grill. Located across the street to the beach and close to restaurants, shops and bars. Check out our other Airbnb studios.  https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/18276051 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/18568947
